attributes.additional_details: We believe that digital ID cards would strengthen privacy protections and improve public services by providing every citizen with a safe and convenient way to verify their identity. A well-designed, state-backed system can reduce fraud, simplify access to healthcare and benefits, and enhance national security while maintaining strict safeguards.
attributes.background: We urge the UK Government to proceed with the introduction of secure digital ID cards. We encourage a firm commitment to implement it.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister has already announced plans for free digital ID for those living in the UK.
